title: The Gentleman's Walking Stick
description: London, 1817 An anthology of two short stories of the Captain Lacey Regency Mysteries.In The Gentleman's Walking Stick, Lacey untangles a web of deceit involving a respectable society man, his only clue being a missing walking stick.In The Disappearance of Miss Sarah Oswald, Lacey is asked to locate a man's missing daughter, though he senses that the family will be just as happy for her to remain missing.
author: Ashley Gardner
